successes.title: LUNAR MISSION ONE: A new lunar mission for everyone.
successes.description: Lunar Mission One: the most inspirational mission to the Moon since the Apollo landings, and your chance to reserve your place in space

Pledges.description: SUPPORTER 3 -- Our eternal thanks and a place in space history! -- Online community access to project photos, videos and updates

SUPPORTER 15 -- AS SUPPORTER 3 plus -- Emailed certificate of thanks. -- Subscription to exclusive regular Lunar Mission One newsletter including project updates and interviews with leading team members -- Your name inscribed on the website ‘wall of thanks’

CLUB MEMBER 30 -- AS SUPPORTER 15 plus -- Your name included in a digital ‘wall of thanks’ to be included in the public archive in the time capsule -- Membership of the Lunar Missions Club for the duration of Lunar Mission One: access to exclusive updates, information and opportunities to participate in project reviews, investigations and key decisions
COUPLES SUPPORTER 15 - As 'Supporter 15' but for TWO people -- contains two individual rewards

CLUB MEMBER 60 -- AS CLUB MEMBER 30 plus -- RESERVE YOUR PLACE IN SPACE: a voucher for your digital ‘memory box’ in the time capsule (value equivalent to your pledge) -- Membership of the Lunar Missions Club for this and all future missions – access to exclusive updates / information and the opportunity to participate in project reviews, investigations and voting to help inform key project decisions
FAMILY SUPPORTER 15 - As 'Supporter 15' but for FOUR people -- contains four individual rewards
COUPLES CLUB MEMBER 30 - As 'Club Member 30' but for TWO people -- contains two individual rewards
CLUB MEMBER 120 -- AS CLUB MEMBER 60 plus -- RESERVE YOUR PLACE IN SPACE: a greater value voucher for your digital ‘memory box’ in the time capsule (value equivalent to your pledge)
FAMILY CLUB MEMBER 30 - As 'Club Member 30' but for FOUR people -- contains four individual rewards
COUPLES CLUB MEMBER 60 - As 'Club Member 60' but for TWO people -- contains two individual rewards
FAMILY CLUB MEMBER 60 - As 'Club Member 60' but for FOUR people -- contains four individual rewards
COUPLES CLUB MEMBER 120 - As 'Club Member 120' but for TWO people -- contains two individual rewards

CLUB MEMBER 300 -- AS CLUB MEMBER 120 plus -- Invitation to annual ‘Meet the Team’ event in London or New York (for the first three years – development stage) -- RESERVE YOUR PLACE IN SPACE: a greater value voucher for your digital ‘memory box’ in the time capsule (value equivalent to your pledge)
FAMILY CLUB MEMBER 120 - As 'Club Member 120' but for FOUR people -- contains four individual rewards

CLUB MEMBER 600 -- AS CLUB MEMBER 300 plus -- Entry into a ballot to win the chance to name the lunar landing module -- RESERVE YOUR PLACE IN SPACE: a greater value voucher for your digital ‘memory box’ in the time capsule (value equivalent to your pledge) -- Invitation to annual ‘Meet the Team’ event in London or New York (for the duration of the project)

CLUB MEMBER 1200 -- AS CLUB MEMBER 600 plus -- Invitation to the rocket launch at the launch site -- RESERVE YOUR PLACE IN SPACE: a greater value voucher for your digital ‘memory box’ in the time capsule (value equivalent to your pledge)

SCHOOLS OFFER -- Online community access to project photos, videos and updates -- Subscription to exclusive regular Lunar Mission One newsletter including project updates and interviews with leading team members -- Emailed certificate of thanks -- School name inscribed on the website and public archive ‘wall of thanks’ -- Poster about Lunar Mission One and its contribution to science (x5) -- School name/crest/logo inscribed on the lunar landing module -- 2 hour downloadable interactive lesson from one of the LM1 scientists (5 versions available: 5-7 yr olds, 7-11, 11-14, 16+ and special educational needs) -- £2,000 voucher for school digital memory box -- A half day immersive teaching experience from one of LM1’s leaders (if lesson is outside UK, it will be attended remotely) – A 2 week work experience placement (age 16+ students only) at one of the organisations involved in delivering Lunar Mission One (including Pagefield – one of London’s leading communications consultancies; RAL Space – the Rutherford Appleton Space Laboratory; and the Open University)

CLUB MEMBER 3000 -- AS CLUB MEMBER 1200 plus -- Have your name inscribed on the lunar landing module -- Invitation to the official ‘unveiling’ of the spacecraft -- Invitation to the sealing of the Archive -- RESERVE YOUR PLACE IN SPACE: a greater value voucher for your digital ‘memory box’ in the time capsule (value equivalent to your pledge)

CLUB MEMBER 5000 -- AS CLUB MEMBER 3000 plus -- A place in the viewing gallery at mission control to watch the spacecraft landing  -- RESERVE YOUR PLACE IN SPACE: a greater value voucher for your digital ‘memory box’ in the time capsule (value equivalent to your pledge)

CORPORATE OFFER -- Your company’s name / logo inscribed on the lunar landing module and on our Website -- Lunar Mission One ‘Founder Supporter’ insignia for inclusion on your website and in other materials -- Certificate of thanks -- Corporate membership of the Lunar Missions Club including invitations (for up to 10 staff) to attend an Annual ‘Meet the Team’ event in either London or New York (for next 3 years) -- A place at mission control to watch the spacecraft landing for your CEO/Chairman/owner, or a customer, or a star employee (could be selected by internal competition) -- A voucher (value equivalent to pledge) for your digital memory box in the time capsule -- Half day immersive teaching experience for the partner school of your choice with one of LM1’s leaders (if no LM1 leader is in your country, it will be delivered remotely)
